question.questionText: Use the "slope" and "no slope" stream-table maps and logs on the facing page to answer these questions. What information do you get from the stream-table logs that you do not get from the stream-table maps?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: You can see how much time is taken for the earth materials to move.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: It tells you when things happened.
The times, as well as things that have to do with the time, and observations you cannot draw.
